login.failure: Authentication has failed. Please try again.

widget.empty-or-no-fav-common: No communities joined yet or no favorite community set

descriptions.totalVolumeStatAmphiro: A stat widget displaying the total consumption for your last 10 showers. You can later change this to show the last 20 or 50 showers.
descriptions.totalVolumeChartAmphiro: A chart widget presenting the consumption for your last 10 showers for all installed devices. You can later change this to show the last 20 or 50 showers.
descriptions.totalVolumeStatSWM: A widget displaying your household's total water consumption for the last month. You can later change it to daily, weekly or yearly consumption.
descriptions.totalVolumeChartSWM: A chart widget displaying your household's total water consumption progress in the last month. You can later change it to daily, weekly or yearly consumption.
descriptions.totalEnergyStat: A stat widget displaying the total energy consumption for your last 10 showers. You can later change this to show the last 20 or 50 showers.
descriptions.totalEnergyChart: A chart widget displaying the total energy progress for your last 10 showers. You can later change this to show the last 20 or 50 showers.
descriptions.totalTemperatureStat: A widget displaying the average temperature for your last 10 showers. You can later change this to show the last 20 or 50 showers.
descriptions.totalTemperatureChart: A widget displaying the average temperature variation for your last 10 showers. You can later change this to show the last 20 or 50 showers.
descriptions.last: A widget displaying the last shower recorded for all your devices.
descriptions.efficiencyEnergy: A widget displaying your shower energy score for the last 10 showers. You can later change this to see the energy efficiency for the last 20 or 50 showers.
descriptions.ranking: A widget displaying the household members ranking based on average shower water consumption.
descriptions.breakdown: A chart widget displaying your computed water use per household appliance.
descriptions.forecast: A chart widget depicting our estimations for your water use for the next month based on your use so far!
descriptions.pricing: A chart widget showing your monthly consumption within the price ranges
descriptions.comparison: A widget showing your consumption in comparison to others, like your neighbors or your city average for the previous month.
descriptions.budget: A widget showing your consumption based on your daily budget.
descriptions.wateriqStat: A widget showing your Water IQ for the previous month.
descriptions.wateriqChart: A chart widget showing your Water IQ for the previous month against your city, neighbors and similar users.
descriptions.commons: A chart widget showing your consumption against your favorite community for the current month. You can later change this to weekly, or monthly period. You can select your favorite community in the settings section.
descriptions.tip: A widget displaying a tip to help you reduce consumption

history.volumeDetails: Total water used for this shower
history.energyDetails: Estimated energy used for hot water
history.countDetails: The total number of aggregated showers
history.inPicturesHover-volume: Approximately {number} times the volume of a {scale}!
history.inPicturesHover-energy: Approximately {number} times the energy of a {scale}!

comparisons.wateriq-best: {month} is the best ({value}) of the last six months
comparisons.wateriq-worst: {month} is the worst ({value}) of the last six months

cost-energy.label: Energy cost
cost-energy.help: The cost per KWh in euros

cost-water.label: Water cost
cost-water.help: The cost per cubic liter in euros

commons.noCommons: Not a member of any commmunities yet
